snippet: Rick Santorum warns that Mitt Romney was the candidate of the "establishment" and would only perpetuate "the status quo."
abstract: Rick Santorum warns that Mitt Romney was the candidate of the "establishment" and would only perpetuate "the status quo."
lead_paragraph: AMHERST, N.H. -- In what may have been a preview of Saturday night's debate, Rick Santorum took several swipes at Mitt Romney by name Saturday, departing from his usual practice of referring to the front-runner only obliquely.
